# dataman

Json & Yaml file parse tools.

## Install

```shell
pip install fastutils
```

## Installed Utils

- json
   - get
- yaml
   - get

## Bug report

Please report any issues at https://github.com/zencore-cn/zencore-issues.

## Releases


### v0.1.0 2020/08/13

- First release.
- Add json.get and yaml.get tools.
- Output unquote support.
